Shilen's Stone Statue: I am Shilen's avatar. Shilen commanded me to watch over this island and protect it from evil beings. The duty is growing increasingly difficult. But I have prayed to Shilen and she has decreed that she would send a warrior who can defeat the threat we face. Are you the one? No... You are too weak to be the warrior mother Shilen spoke of. (Only characters level 77 and above are permitted to take on this quest.)
